definition: abbr. for Syria 敘利亞|叙利亚[Xu4 li4 ya4]
Syriac language (from c. 2nd century BC)/the Syriac script

sentences.english: After World War I, Syria became a French mandate.
sentences.chinese: 第一次世界大战后，叙利亚成了法国的托管地。

sentences.english: The Syrian government launched a violent campaign against pro-democracy protesters in March.
sentences.chinese: 叙利亚政府三月份对主张民主的示威者展开暴力镇压。

sentences.english: Later I went to Syria and Cilicia.
sentences.chinese: 以后我到了叙利亚和基利家境内。

sentences.english: Palmyra was in the ancient times an important city of central Syria.
sentences.chinese: 在古代，帕尔米拉是叙利亚中部的一个重要城市。

sentences.english: How close was the North Korean-Syrian cooperation?
sentences.chinese: 叙利亚和北韩的合作密切到什么程度？

sentences.english: Offenders will be fined 2, 000 Syrian pounds _ about $45.
sentences.chinese: 违者将处以2000叙利亚币的罚款，约45美元。

sentences.english: The Syrian government is continuing its crackdown Monday against anti-government protesters.
sentences.chinese: 叙利亚政府正在继续镇压反日反政府示威者。

sentences.english: Washington should wait out the slow death of the Syrian regime.
sentences.chinese: 华盛顿应该暂且不动，等候叙利亚政权的慢慢消失。

sentences.english: It wouldn't hurt the Syrian people, " said Tabler."
sentences.chinese: 因此制裁损害不了叙利亚人民。

sentences.english: In the Golan Heights, an estimated 80, 000 Syrians fled.
sentences.chinese: 在戈兰高地，大约有八十万叙利亚人背景离乡。

sentences.english: The interpreter of the caravan answered that we had come from the island of Syria with much merchandise.
sentences.chinese: 商队的翻译答道我们满载着商货自叙利亚的岛屿而来。

sentences.english: Does Mr Husain deny Syrians the right to self-defence?
sentences.chinese: 哈米德先生难道否认叙利亚人民的自卫权利？

sentences.english: Open civil war has broken out in Libya.
sentences.chinese: 公开的国内战争已经在叙利亚爆发。

sentences.english: The Chinese priority in Syria, as insomuch else, is how to work with the United States.
sentences.chinese: 在叙利亚，中国比美国在其他许多事情上是有优先的。

sentences.english: I'm guessing you won't be seeing Chinataking any Syrian refugees in.
sentences.chinese: 我猜中国不会接收任何的叙利亚难民。

sentences.english: After the demonstration, as Israel accused Syria to divert attention.
sentences.chinese: 示威发生后，以色列指责叙利亚以此转移视线。

definition: Muslim countries/caliphate/Islamic State group (aka IS or ISIL or ISIS)
